page.title: 04FASHION IN BENWELL
page.content: {Fashion}these days is quite exciting.There are lots of different {hairstyles}.Some are very funny and some are nice.The funny ones are like skin-heads and {punk}style.The skin-head is when you get all your hair shaved off. Punk style is just all sticking up and different colours.The nice hairstyles are the bob which is down to your shoulders and a short fringe.Jewellry is very nice but dear.You can get some necklaces with charms on them.You can also get bracelets,watches and earrings.Clothes today are very classy because different people wear different styles of clothes each day.Some people wear skirts,trousers,blouses and luminous socks. As for shoes there are sandals,high heels,trainers and wellingtons(wellies).
